articles.description: “Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater” series changed video games — and helped explode the sport’s popularity. Hawk says he never expected it.
articles.content:
After becoming the worlds most recognizable athlete for his chosen sport, Anthony Frank Tony Hawk is now a 57-year-old grandfather. Its a life thats vastly exceeded any expectations he ever had.
Nam… [+9434 chars]

articles.author: Liam Dawe
articles.title: Valve gets pressured by payment processors with a new rule for game devs and various adult games removed - GamingOnLinux
articles.description: Valve have added a new rule to the Onboarding guide for game developers, noting that payment processors get a say in what stays on Steam.
articles.content: It is becoming increasingly common.There are people out there happy to make certain kinds of adult content, and people out there happy to enjoy it, and plenty more people happy to mind their own busi… [+2093 chars]
